ON_FILE_DELETE.TITLE: Are you sure?
ON_FILE_DELETE.TEXT: You are about to remove files ! Beware, this action cannot be undone.

ON_LOCALSTORAGE_DELETE.TITLE: Are you sure?
ON_LOCALSTORAGE_DELETE.TEXT: All your saved localStorage values will be removed

ON_MULTIPLE_DOWNLOAD.TITLE: Multiple download are currently unavailable
ON_MULTIPLE_DOWNLOAD.TEXT: Sorry the multiple download feature is under construction.

ACTION.COPY: File(s) has been copied into your files.
ACTION.COPY_SINGULAR: file has been copied into your Personal Space.
ACTION.COPY_PLURAL: files have been copied into your Personal Space.
ACTION.SHARE: Your file share was sent successfully.
ACTION.SHARE_ASYNC: Your file share will be sent after the upload of all files.

WARNING.AT_LEAST_ONE_RECIPIENT: Please enter one recipient to share with

ERROR.FILE_NOT_FOUND: The selected file has not been found
ERROR.RENAME_FILE: A file with the same name already exists
ERROR.RENAME_FOLDER: A folder with the same name already exists
ERROR.RENAME_CONTACTS_LIST: A contact list with the same name already exists

RENAME_INVALID.ENDING_POINT: The name cannot finish by the character '.'
RENAME_INVALID.REJECTED_CHAR: The name is invalid, you cannot use the following characters: '{{rejectedChar}}'

DELETE_ERROR.26006: Deletion of a non-empty folder is not yet supported

ERROR.NO_RESPONSE_ERROR: Error without server response, see logs.

WARNING.ERROR_403: You are not authorized to delete this document
WARNING.ISOLATED_FILE: Isolation mode activated: you are currently viewing a restricted file selection.
